qas.question: What disease contributed greatly to Bell's death?
On what day and month did Bell die?
Who was the last person to see Bell alive?
In what Province did Bell die?

context: Bell died of complications arising from <a0_0>diabetes<a0_0/> on <a1_0>August 2<a1_0/>, 1922, at his private estate, Beinn Bhreagh, <a3_0>Nova Scotia<a3_0/>, at age 75. Bell had also been afflicted with pernicious anemia. His last view of the land he had inhabited was by moonlight on his mountain estate at 2:00 a.m.[N 29][N 30] While tending to him after his long illness, <a2_0>Mabel<a2_0/>, his wife, whispered, "Don't leave me." By way of reply, Bell traced the sign for "no" in the air —and then he died.
